msContents.summary: Ff. i v-ii v: Image of Michael, Mälk‘a Mika’el, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡. Répertoire 119, incomplete at the beginning. F-186r: Homiliary in Honor of the Monthly Feast of the Archangel Michael, owner Walatta Madhen (1r and passim). F-192v: Image of Michael, Mälk‘a Mika’el, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡. Répertoire 119, written in a different hand. mentions prayers ለነፍሰ ወልደ ሚካኤል, perhaps the late husband. gives a longer version of the name, ገብሩ ወልደ ሚካኤል. mentions her brother (without mentioning his name), and her mother, ወለተ ሚካኤል. mentions her father, ወልደ ጸድቅ, and her children, ገብረ ዋሕድ, ሠይፈ ሥላሴ, ወልደ አማኑኤል, እኅተ ሚካኤል, ጽላሎተ ድንግል, ምሥጢረ ሥላሴ, cf. the list on . The scribe is mentioned on , ዘርአ ዮሐንስ. The harags suggest Gov Scriptorium of Selassie. The harags employ some reverse writing (e.g., 1r). Several illuminations have been added which were painted over text.

origin.origDate: 1930-1974. F. 7r and passim mention ኃይለ ስላሴ.
